name: InstallerFileTakeOver LPE CVE-2021-41379 File Create Event
description: Detects signs of the exploitation of LPE CVE-2021-41379 that include an msiexec process that creates an elevation_service.exe file
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\msiexec.exe AND file.path:C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Microsoft\\Edge\\Application* AND file.path:*\\elevation_service.exe)`
